title: RACING SESSION detail page Â» RACING EVENT
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know to which RACING EVENT each RACING SESSION belongs\
So I can find out what other sessions happened in that event
description:
* The RACING SESSION detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACING EVENT.
* The RACING EVENT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACING EVENT contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACING EVENT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING EVENT connected to the RACING SESSION then the section is not displayed at all.
